snippet: Tea Party and good government types are coming together to promote term limits on statewide and legislative officials in Texas, who are able to serve as long as voters can stand them.
lead_paragraph: Tea Party and good government types are coming together to promote term limits on statewide and legislative officials in Texas, who are able to serve as long as voters can stand them.

headline.seo: Seeking Fresh Policies and Faces, Lawmakers Push for Term Limits
headline.main: Seeking Fresh Policies and Faces, Lawmakers Push for Term Limits
headline.print_headline: Seeking Fresh Policies and Faces, Lawmakers Push for Term Limits
